    io.micronaut.http.server.exceptions.ExceptionHandler<ContextRetrievalException,​io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<ProblemDetails>>

@Singleton
@Requires(classes={ContextRetrievalException.class,io.micronaut.http.server.exceptions.ExceptionHandler.class})
public class ContextRetrievalExceptionHandler
